targets.expression:
fields @timestamp, @message, @logStream
| filter @message like "HEAD is now"
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100

fields @timestamp,@message 
| filter @message like "HEAD is now"
| parse @message "HEAD is now at * Merge pull request * *" as id, id2, id3
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 10000

fields @timestamp, @message 
| filter @message like "Phase complete: BUILD State"
| parse @message "* * * * * * * *" as id, id2, id3, id4, id5, id6, id7, id8
| limit 10000

fields @timestamp, @message 
| filter @message like "Phase complete: PRE_BUILD State"
| parse @message "* * * * * * * *" as id, id2, id3, id4, id5, id6, id7, id8
| limit 10000

fields @timestamp, @message 
| filter @message like "Phase complete: POST_BUILD State"
| parse @message "* * * * * * * *" as id, id2, id3, id4, id5, id6, id7, id8
| limit 10000
